mapper.select: select tbp.orderId, tpc.id, tpc.productId, tpc.userId, tpc.userNickName, tpc.star, tpc.comment, tpc.createTime, tpc.createUserId, tpc.modifyTime, tpc.modifyUserId from tb_order_product tbp left join tb_product_comment tpc on tbp.productId = tpc.productId where tbp.productId = #{productId} and tbp.orderId = #{orderId} order by tpc.modifyTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product_comment( productId, userId, userNickName, star, comment, createTime, createUserId, modifyTime, modifyUserId) values(#{productComment.productId}, #{productComment.userId}, #{productComment.userNickName}, #{productComment.star}, #{productComment.comment}, GETDATE(), #{productComment.createUserId}, GETDATE(), #{productComment.updateUserId});
